meanings.definition: In a manner that is centered around the Earth.
meanings.sent1: The ancient astronomers believed the planets moved geocentrically.
meanings.sent2: The map was drawn geocentrically, with Earth at the center.
meanings.sent3: The aliens found our geocentrically designed solar system quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts revolved geocentrically around her hometown.
meanings.sent5: The concept of a geocentrically structured universe was mind-boggling.

meanings.definition: With the Earth as the central point of reference.
meanings.sent1: The telescope was calibrated geocentrically for accurate observations.
meanings.sent2: The navigation system was set up geocentrically to track the satellite.
meanings.sent3: The cat viewed the world geocentrically, always returning home.
meanings.sent4: His arguments always circled geocentrically back to his original point.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted geocentrically, capturing Earth's beauty in every stroke.
